sections.title: How to access the User Guide
sections.content:
1.  Via SMS: Text *911# to 08071777770  

2.  Via Telegram: Send ***911#** to **[@A2LofTBot](http://t.me/a2loftbot)**

sections.title: How to send a Report to e911
sections.content:
To report an incidence or make a complaint to e911 the public can use any of the available channels (Currently **Telegram **and **SMS **channels are available)

**WITHOUT ADDING A COMMENT**

\*911\*<ReportCode>\*<StreetNumberOrName>\*<LGA>\*<StateCode>#

**WITH A COMMENT**

\*911\*<ReportCode>\*<StreetNumberOrName>\*<LGA>\*<StateCode>\*<Comment>#

**REPORTING ANONYMOUSLY (WITHOUT COMMENT)**

\*911\*0\*<ReportCode>\*<StreetNumberOrName>\*<LGA>\*<StateCode>#

**REPORTING ANONYMOUSLY (WITH COMMENT)**

\*911\*0\*<ReportCode>\*<StreetNumberOrName>\*<LGA>\*<StateCode>\*<Comment>#

Offline report can be done via SMS. The relevant USSD message should be sent (as SMS) to the e911 number 08071777770

Online report can be done via the **Instant Messenger (telegram)** available in Android, Apple and Windows stores. Search for **a2loft** on after downloading Telegram Messenger and post the relevant USSD message found above.

sections.title: Subscribing to e911 Notifications
sections.content: **SMS: ** \*911\*sub\*<StateCode># . . . . TO **08071777770 **(OFFLINE) **Telegram:** \*911\*sub\*<StateCode># . . . . TO **@A2LofTBot** SMS subscribers will ONLY get **Level 1 Notifications**. (e.g. public service notifications) Subscribers to **e911 Notifications **service are assigned a **Basic Profile **which they update to a **Standard Profile **by adding more details their profile. Besides receiving vital public notices and emergency preparedness tips, subscribers to e911 Notifications can participate in Citizens Evaluation of e911 services (user-rating), create InstantReport files, among other privileges. **StateCode **is the first two characters of the state you are reporting from which the exception of KD->Kaduna, KN->Kano, KT->Katsina, BY->Bayelsa, and FC->Abuja Federal Capital Territory.
